My husband and I give Kiva gift certificates to everyone in our family for Christmas.  That is the true spirit of the season - giving back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide consulting to businesses, non-profits and affiliations to engage more business leaders in supporting education.

lenders.name: Neil Budgen
lenders.loan_because: It is a pleasure and a privilege to play a part in helping someone with their dream. Some will fail, but those that are prepared to have a go will face many challenges and mere money should not be one of them.
lenders.occupational_info: I help independent business owners develop their vision and achieve their dreams. From start up to exit I support them and help them understand the business of business. When I see them smiling, I know I’m doing a good job!

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I can, and therefore I should.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: Growing up in Honduras, I learned the importance of giving back to the community at an early age.  My father first taught me about microfinance when I was twelve.  He explained that it worked by loaning money to people who otherwise would not have the resources to earn a living.  It’s not just about giving; the loans empower people to expand their small businesses, learn about financial responsibility, and lend a hand to their neighbors in similar situations. A little help really does go a long way.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I can cycle my one loan many times!

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.  These people are not asking for us to give them money, they are asking us to loan them money.  The difference is monumental.

lenders.name: Pc Mechanix
lenders.loan_because:
i was retrench from work due to slow business at my work place. So i started my small pc fix it shop to support my famliy. I need to put in more pc parts and other relate items.
Because i m a small business, all the banks in Malaysia won't give the chance for me to get a loan. Please help me, i m in a jammed.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small computer store that with limited resources due to limited space and pc parts to serve my customer. I m trying to make a living for my wife and 3 kids that still in school. My wife works at a small hotel near my hometown as a clerk. She had to work from 9am to 10pm every day. And i have to bring my children after school directly to my shop so they can be monitored and fed. For the future of my famliy, please help.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's humbling to realize the impact that even a small loan can make in someone's life. I know how challenging it is to build a business. Kiva enables me to help others do that.
lenders.occupational_info: We help socially conscious companies create brands that lead with their values. Our brand positioning, design, and marketing communication work connects brands to their audiences because of the emotional links their shared values provide.

lenders.name: Gerben
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a way that works. Not supporting corrupt governments or organisations who's CEO's need to get paid too. I feel that by supporting an individual entrepeneur you'll support his surroundings... Thus supporting the community. Which in long term will be far more effective than money spent in the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the last link in the chain of making films and commercials. I check everything from spelling to dust on the film. I make copies, i make dvd's. I also write scripts now and than. Also i'm in a band. See and listen below :)

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: It is the bodhisattva way of life. The life of compassion and to ease the suffering of all sentient beings.

I also work for a vet, taking care of peoples pets, making sure that they are healthy and cared for.

lenders.name: Luc
lenders.loan_because: I am going to Vietnam in 2008 as part of a high-school trip, and apart from touring the country, I want to see a culture different from my own and by making a loan I can see where my contribution may assist others not quite as fortunate as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in high-school in Auckland, New Zealand, and have a range of interests including science, technology, IT etc and various sports .. and I have no idea what I want to do after I leave school.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: It puts capital into the hands of people who can make good use of it, and will help me to develop a stronger sense of empathy.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance. It makes me feel good to know I'm doing my part to redistribute wealth to people who truly need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in South Korea.

lenders.loan_because: I've been given so many opportunities, and I want to give some to others.

lenders.occupational_info: currently unemployed

lenders.name: Megan Fitzgerald
lenders.occupation: Expat Career and Personal Branding Coach
lenders.loan_because: There are millions of entrepreneurs out there with fantastic vision, passion and purpose who just need a little support to help them build the business that is going to support their family and their community. Supporting economic growth around the world serves all of us - with just a small loan anyone can have incredible impact in someone else's life - and an impact on the world's economic development as a result.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help expats committed to their own growth and success be more visible, sought after and land work abroad. Having built a portable career that supports my choice of global living, I use my 19+ years experience in professional and business development in 40+ countries and a creative, in depth and online-centered approach to help others do the same. 

To learn more visit my website (below) or my blog:  www.careerbychoiceblog.com.

Thanks for the visit. It's great to be a part of this community. If we all do our part I believe the world will be a better place because of it.

lenders.name: Ryan&Crystal
lenders.loan_because: first, out of God's love for us, we love Him back. Then out of that, flows a love and servanthood toward all of His people as Jesus demonstrated perfectly.
lenders.occupational_info:
Crystal is a pre-kindergarten teacher who works with 4 year olds.
Ryan works in a Christ-centered church with children ages 10 to 18. He develops programs, organizes events, builds relationships, and teaches lessons in order to draw teenages closer to Jesus, His Salvation, and His message of community.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: God always takes care of my needs and I feel it is my turn now to  help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a computer professional and am retired now.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. I am particularly keen on helping women in the developing world because I am a great believer in the power of women to change the world. I lived in Asia for 12 years, and while I have seen some terrible poverty, I have also met some wonderful people who work really hard to make their lives and the lives of their communities better.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an advertising agency with my husband. We advertise products and services for a number of local, national and international clients

lenders.name: Timothy

lenders.occupational_info:
RETIRED FROM FINANCIAL SERVICES NOW FINANCIAL LITERACY VOLUNTEER OF

lenders.name: Scotty

If I can help people better themselves through their hard work, I am willing to help out.  

As long as someone is willing to work to make a living, and if they are willing to take a risk by taking a loan, and if a small loan will help people to make their life better, then it is worth helping those people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government to help people in their time of need.

lenders.name: Laurie
